item.title: Donna add a quote by Donna Grant
item.description: "You're a Scott," the Dark said, his lips peeled back in displeasure, as if just saying the word was revolting. "And you're Irish. I'm so glad we got that settled." -- Donna Grant

item.title: Donna add a quote by Donna Grant
Donna add a quote by Donna Grant
Donna add a quote by Donna Grant
item.description: "She drank in the sight of him, the power, the virility, the sheer sexiness. She knew just how well those lips of his kissed, how gentle and coaxing his hands could be, and how mouth-watering his body was." -- Donna Grant

item.title: Donna add a quote by Donna Grant
Donna add a quote by Donna Grant
item.description: "What do you want?" "You." His voice was soft, low. His eyes were intense and watchful." -- Donna Grant

item.title: Donna add a quote by Donna Grant
item.description: "I never counted on you, lass. You are strong, honorable, clever, shrewd, beautiful, and resilient. You doona ever quit, and you doona ever give up. So why give up on me?" -- Donna Grant

item.title: Donna add a quote by Donna Grant
item.description:
"Forgive our gawking,” said a man with a vicious scar running down his face. “Galen is usually eating so much he has no time for speech.”
Laughter filled the hall, and Reaghan glanced over to find Galen shaking his head as he smiled.
“Eating?” she asked.
“Doona pay Malcolm a bit of attention,” Galen said, his gaze indifferent and his voice heavy with nonchalance. “He lies." -- Donna Grant

item.title: Donna add a quote by Donna Grant
item.description: "She leaned a shoulder against the tunnel wall and thought of Kellan. A Dragon King. A dragon and a King. A gorgeous man who kissed as if there were no tomorrow and made love skillfully, adeptly. He could have let her die. Instead, he took her on a journey that opened her eyes to an entirely new world both beautiful and frightening." -- Donna Grant

item.title: Donna add a quote by Donna Grant
item.description: "His mouth descended on hers in a fierce kiss. He seized, he captured. He dominated. And she loved every second of it." -- Donna Grant
